column1:
While the spread of the coronavirus globally was likely a catalyst, the stock market correction makes sense in context of a broader set of risks. See three main ones, all of which are now receding:
 https://www.morganstanley.com/ideas/putting-correction-in-context?social_network=twitter&suggested_content_id=1342477&workspace_id=321791&ET_MID=noloc&cid=whmt-smfa-gicweek-4452 …
